title: Graphing the function
text: The first step would be to graph the current function.

title: Identifying which coordinate to change
text: Say that we want to reflect $$(1,2)$$ across the x-axis. What will the reflected coordinate look like?

title: Reflecting exponential functions
text: The function f(x) $$=$$ $$-\left(b^x\right)$$ reflects the parent function f(x) $$=$$ $$b^x$$ about the x-axis. The function f(x) $$=$$ $$b^{\left(-x\right)}$$ reflects the parent function f(x) $$=$$ $$b^x$$ about the y-axis.\n
